title: Template Type and Vault Root Override Success
details:
SUCCESSFULLY COMPLETED: Template-type naming standardization and vault root override functionality

KEY ACHIEVEMENTS:
1. ✅ Updated metadata.yaml with new template-type conventions:
   - Index templates use simple names: main, program, course, class, module
   - Content templates use -note suffix: video-reference-note, live-session-note

2. ✅ Updated all related code:
   - MetadataHierarchyDetector.cs: Updated to handle new template-type conventions
   - MarkdownNoteProcessor.cs, VideoNoteProcessor.cs: Use new template types
   - VaultCommands.cs: Updated clean-index to recognize new template types
   - MetadataHierarchyDetectorTests.cs: Updated to match new conventions

3. ✅ Fixed vault root override functionality:
   - VaultRootContextService properly integrated with DI container
   - MetadataHierarchyDetector correctly uses override vault root via service
   - Commands properly set vault root override in scoped context

4. ✅ Verified correct hierarchy detection with test vault:
   - MBA (root): template-type: main ✅
   - Digital Program: template-type: program, program: MBA ✅  
   - Finance: template-type: course, program: MBA, course: Digital Program ✅
   - Corporate-Finance: template-type: class, program: MBA, course: Digital Program, class: Finance ✅

COMMAND VERIFICATION:
- `dotnet run --project src/c-sharp/NotebookAutomation.Cli -- vault ensure-metadata "D:\source\notebook-automation\test-vault-structure\Projects\MBA" --override-vault-root "D:\source\notebook-automation\test-vault-structure\Projects"` ✅
- `dotnet run --project src/c-sharp/NotebookAutomation.Cli -- vault generate-index "D:\source\notebook-automation\test-vault-structure\Projects\MBA" --override-vault-root "D:\source\notebook-automation\test-vault-structure\Projects" --force` ✅

DEBUG OUTPUT CONFIRMED:
- Vault root correctly shows: 'D:\source\notebook-automation\test-vault-structure\Projects'
- Hierarchy metadata correctly assigned at all levels
- Template-type assignments follow new conventions

The system now correctly:
1. Uses vault root override when specified with --override-vault-root flag
2. Assigns template-type: main to the vault root folder (MBA)
3. Properly maps hierarchy levels: main -> program -> course -> class -> module
4. Updates all index files with correct metadata and navigation
